data.message: I'm really confused about the negative response about Eminem "becoming" political. He dropped "Mosh" 13 years ago... If you claim to be an Eminem fan and didn't realize he had political influences until this year, you really haven't been paying attention. This is a deep track, it's meaningful and raw and real. I'm excited.

replies.message:
Mosh was about the war in Iraq. White america is about parental advisory labeling. 
He's now dissing his fans through his political outbursts. Little bit of a difference...
Dayne Rochon Mosh was very clearly about Bush and if you didn't pick up on that, you weren't listening.
If he had any balls he would of spoke up about Obama
Dayne Rochon he has like 6 songs dedicated to dissing George bush
Who gives a fuck this song here is garbage !!!!
Eminem literally refered to his fans as "fucking retards" in "Criminal" and nobody cared. Why do they care now just because he said "fuck you" to the Trumpkins?
Alexis Marie uhh yes Alexis you're correct. Bush was the president during the war as well. So yes those two go hand in hand  lol. but you do know that wasn't my point right..?
